name: Welt

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

story: A seasoned member of the Express Crew.The passion buried in his heart burns anew as he enjoys this fresh adventure.Occasionally, he would sketch the experiences in a notebook.

ascensionMaterials.itemName: Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
Golden Crown of the Past Shadow
Golden Crown of the Past Shadow

skills.name: Gravity Suppression
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Edge of the Void
skills.description: Deals minor Imaginary DMG to a single enemy. This attack can Bounce 3 times, with a chance of Slowing the hit enemies.

skills.name: Synthetic Black Hole
skills.description: Deals Imaginary DMG to all enemies, with a high chance of Imprisoning them.

skills.name: Time Distortion
skills.description: When hitting a Slowed enemy, additionally deals minor Imaginary Additional DMG.

skills.name: Gravitational Imprisonment
skills.description: Creates a special dimension. Enemies in this dimension have their Movement SPD reduced. After entering combat with enemies in the dimension, there is a high chance for the enemies to become Imprisoned.

eidolons.name: Legacy of Honor
eidolons.description: After Welt uses his Ultimate, his abilities are enhanced. The next 2 time(s) he uses his Basic ATK or Skill, deals Additional DMG to the target equal to 50% of his Basic ATK's DMG multiplier or 80% of his Skill's DMG multiplier respectively.

eidolons.name: Conflux of Stars
eidolons.description: When his Talent is triggered, Welt regenerates 3 Energy.

eidolons.name: Prayer of Peace
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Appellation of Justice
eidolons.description: Base chance for Skill to inflict SPD Reduction increases by 35%.

eidolons.name: Power of Kindness
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Prospect of Glory
eidolons.description: When using Skill, deals DMG for 1 extra time to a random enemy.
